titleStmt.title: Dr. Burnets vindication of himself from the calumnies with which he is aspersed in a pamphlet entitled Parliamentum pacificum licensed by the Earl of Sunderland and printed at London in March 1688.
titleStmt.author: Burnet, Gilbert, 1643-1715.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: Pages stained, with print show-through and loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
Bound with: Reflections on a pamphlet entitled Parliamentum pacificum. [S.l. : s.n., 1689?]
